FlavorTextOption.Text: Reports are coming in of a large spike in pirate activity. Apparently someone has been providing them with advanced technologies and maybe even ships. I fear our normal precautions may no longer be enough when dealing with them.
We must defend ourselves from these poor souls. As they stay far away from us, they are none of our concern. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +40)[/COLOR]
We must protect our ships and our borders. We will work with our allies to remove this threat. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +40)[/COLOR]
We will hunt down each and every one of these parasites, and teach them the folly of Piracy. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +40)[/COLOR]
